Articles.Content:
Happy 2018! This New Year's Eve I started playing with the kind of fireworks that don't scare dogs or cats, only Kerbals. There is an old mod that adds fireworks to the game, and by some miracle, it still works in KSP 1.3.1. Enjoy!

Mod: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/115069-kerbal-fireworks/&tab=comments#comment-2531513

Music: "Egmont Overture Finale" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
